mapper.select: SELECT e.dealer_name,d.order_no,c.brand_name,c.brand_series_name as series_name,c.brand_series_product_name as product_name, b.user_name,a.goods_out_time,count( DISTINCT a.box_no ) AS boxCount FROM l_ser_warehouse_goods_out_info a LEFT JOIN t_sys_user_info b ON a.user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_ser_goods_info c ON a.box_no = c.m5 LEFT JOIN t_ser_order_info d ON a.order_id = d.id LEFT JOIN t_ser_dealer_info e ON d.dealer_id = e.id where 1=1 GROUP BY e.dealer_name,d.order_no,c.brand_name,c.brand_series_name, c.brand_series_product_name,b.user_name,a.goods_out_time limit #{page},#{limit}
